name: NEVER LET GO (Genes)
description:
NEVER LET GO

Using a gamepad is highly recommended and don't foget to put the game in fullscreen!!!

Features:
  • The game is entirely playable in solo with a keyboard or a gamepad but can also be played with a friend. 
  • There are multiple paths that you can explore.
  • You can try to collect all the strawberrys as an additonal challenge
Controls: 
  • Gamepad: Left joystick to move the blue player and left trigger to climb. Right joystick to move the yellow player and right trigger to climb.
  • (You can play with two different controllers)
  • Keyboard : E,S,D,F to move the blue player and Q to climb. H,J,K to move the yellow player and L to climb.
GMTK Game jam:
  • The game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK gamejam
  • The theme was "Joined together"
